text: Francis T. Lavoie (May 22, 1874 – August 26, 1947) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing Northumberland County from 1925 to 1930. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1874 births Category:1947 deaths Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs
title: Francis T. Lavoie
